bajun.name: Cat-Bajun
bajun.info: Magic were-cat attacks the enemy with his songs and spells.
bajun.description: Magic were-cat. Can attack the enemy with his songs and spells. Live at Yaga's hut.

sivka.name: Sivka-Burka
sivka.info: Magic prophetic 'wild' - colored horse, mediating the living and realm of the dead.
sivka.description: Magic prophetic 'wild' - colored horse, mediating the living and realm of the dead.

bogatyr.name: Bogatyr
bogatyr.description: Hero-warrior possessing great power, protector, distinguishes not only by courage, but also by diplomatic abilities.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: In far off lands there is a garden with magic youth-giving apples. If an elder eats such apple - gets younger, and an ill - gets it health back.

bereginya.name: Keeper Bereginya
bereginya.description: Plenty of Keepers lives in our world, inhabiting the forests. Promised in marriage fiancees, gone before their wedding. Keepers appear from the other realm: come out from under ground, descend from the sky on the birch branches, emerge from the rivers and lakes.

shieldLarge.name: Large Shield
shieldLarge.info: Protects its owner from damage until destroyed.
shieldLarge.description: The shield, forged by Svarog - divinity-blacksmith. After recognition of his owner, it can reflect the damage and ensure protection from witchcraft.

shieldSmall.name: Small Shield
shieldSmall.info: Protects its owner from damage until destroyed.
shieldSmall.description: The shield, begot by the tree nymph. The bark of a magic oak from curved sea-shore Lukomore helps in battke dealing with the damage and also can ward off an attacks.

wolf.name: Grey Wolf
wolf.info: Strong and dangerous enemy. Lives in a deep forest, aggresive and unpredictable.
wolf.description: Strong and dangerous enemy. Lives in a deep forest, aggresive and unpredictable.
